title: mA mAya ulagennai
sahitya:
mA mAya ulagennai EmATriDadapaDi mannA taDuttALuvAi shivanE


anupallavi

  kAmAlaik-kaNgaLum kAma valaigaLum gatiyena unnai nambum matiyinaik-kalakkAmal


caraNam    eTTi pazhuttAlum iniya kaniyAgumA iyarkkaik-kONalai nErE iyaTriDalAgumO
kaTTik-karumbirp-puzhukkaNDiDin uNavAmO karuttonru sheyalonrAi varutti varuginra
